Beacon Sample

Available behind a flag in Chrome 37

Beacon let you to asynchronously transfer small HTTP data from the User Agent to a web server. It can be used e.g. to send analytics or diagnostics code without delaying the page's unload or affecting the performance of the next navigation.

The sample below sends a beacon to a sample server at https://putsreq.herokuapp.com/Dt7t2QzUkG18aDTMMcop on unload. Close this page and visit PutsReq inspect page to see if the becaon data was received. 

      
      window.addEventListener('unload', logData, false);

      var diagnosticData = 'Sent by a beacon!';

      function logData() {
          navigator.sendBeacon("https://putsreq.herokuapp.com/Dt7t2QzUkG18aDTMMcop", diagnosticData);
      }
